content: emerald city cowl by wendee shulsen designed to showcase the softness instructions of our new yarn base cashual dk make a slip knot with at least a 6 tail you will use this we present the emerald city cowl tail to seam up the gap at the bottom of the cowl after this lacy cowl has an easy to joining in the round after the set-up row you will be remember stich sequence bordered working in the round and will not be turn at the end of the by half-double_crochet color shown round is emerald city chain 101 half_double_crochet in second chain from the hook and in each materials remaining chain join with a slip_stitch to top of 1st stitch yarn hazel knits cashual dk 80% 100 half_double_crochet superwash merino 10% cashmere round 1 half_double_crochet into 1st stitch place stitch marker in this 10% nylon 270 yards/125 g 1 skein stitch and half_double_crochet all remaining stitches in the round hook us h 5 0 mm 100 half_double_crochet supplies tapestry needle round 2 2dc chain 1 2dc in 3rd stitch from stitch marker for weaving in ends stitch marker - *skip 3 stitches 2dc ch1 2dc in 4th stitch repeat * blocking materials for entire round 25 repeats round 3 - 15 * 2dc chain 1 2dc in chain-1 space repeat * gauge and size for entire round continue for a total of 14 stitch repeat one complete stitch pattern = 1 25 rounds 25 repeats per round after blocking on size h hook round 16 half_double_crochet into 1st and all remaining all double_crochet stitches 8 x 29 circumference skipping the extra stitch made by chain space stitch increase or decrease set-up chain 100 half_double_crochet by four stitches to make cowl wider round 16 half_double_crochet into all stitches single_crochet in last stitch and or narrower fasten_off use 6 tail to close gap at bottom of cowl and weave in all ends abbreviations block to relax stitches and create a buttery soft texture chain=chain single_crochet=single_crochet half_double_crochet=half double cochet double_crochet=double_crochet www hazelknits com pattern support hello@hazelknits com
